⇒ Yassa rūpāyatanaṃ uppajjati tassa manāyatanaṃ uppajjissatīti?

Pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha sotāyatanaṃ nuppajjissati. /   Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha cakkhāyatanañca nuppajjati sotāyatanañca nuppajjissati.
⇐ Yassa vā pana dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa rūpāyatanaṃ na nirujjhatīti?
Arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāyatanañca na nirujjhissati rūpāyatanañca na nirujjhati. /   ⇒ Yassa manāyatanaṃ na nirujjhati tassa dhammāyatanaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?

⇒ Yassa yattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati tassa tattha maggasaccaṃ uppajjissatīti? /   Aggamaggassa uppādakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ upapajjantānaṃ pavatte cittassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ uppajjissati.

“ayaṃ puggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pettivisayaṃ upapajjissatī”ti.
Atha taṃ parisaṃ āgantvā evamārocesi: /   ‘parābhūtarūpo, bho, acelo pāthikaputto.

‘abhikkamāvuso pāthikaputta, abhikkantaṃ te seyyo, abhikkantā abhiññātā abhiññātā licchavī, abhikkantā abhiññātā abhiññātā ca brāhmaṇamahāsālā gahapatinecayikā nānātitthiyā samaṇabrāhmaṇā. Samaṇopi gotamo āyasmato ārāme divāvihāraṃ nisinno.

Yannūnāhampi aññataraṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ nissāya āsayaṃ kappeyyaṃ. /   Tatrāsayaṃ kappetvā sāyanhasamayaṃ āsayā nikkhameyyaṃ, āsayā nikkhamitvā vijambheyyaṃ, vijambhitvā samantā catuddisā anuvilokeyyaṃ, samantā catuddisā anuviloketvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadeyyaṃ, tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkameyyaṃ.
cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ. (1)

Cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, rūpāyatanaṃ, saddāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, yañca rūpaṃ anidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammāyatanapariyāpannaṃ.
Phalāni khuddakappāni, /   bhuñja rāja varaṃ varaṃ. /   Idampi pānīyaṃ sītaṃ,
soṇa taṃ nissitā mayaṃ; /   Upaghātuṃ labhe nandaṃ, /   muddhani brahmacārinaṃ.
“Anukampikā patiṭṭhā ca, /   pubbe rasadadī ca no;
tosentī tena vuccati. /   Tato vātātape ghore, /   mamaṃ katvā udikkhati;
Mātaraṃ aparicaritvāna, /   Kicchaṃ vā so nigacchati. /   Dhanāpi dhanakāmānaṃ,
pitā vā puttakāraṇā. /   Yasmā ca saṅgahā ete, /   sammapekkhanti paṇḍitā;
sapaññaṃ cittaṃ vimuccati, paññā ca cittañca ubho vimuccantīti? /   Āmantā.
‘Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbānī’ti— /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ.
‘Cha bāhirāni āyatanāni veditabbānī’ti— /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?

“Chayime, bhikkhave, baḷisā lokasmiṃ anayāya sattānaṃ byābādhāya pāṇīnaṃ. /   Katame cha? /   Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitabaḷiso mārassa anayaṃ āpanno, byasanaṃ āpanno, yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato.

Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitabaḷiso mārassa anayaṃ āpanno, byasanaṃ āpanno, yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato”ti. /   Ayaṃ saṃkileso. /   Santi ca, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gilitabaḷiso mārassa, abhedi baḷisaṃ, paribhedi baḷisaṃ, na anayaṃ āpanno, na byasanaṃ āpanno, na yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato.
(Saṃkhittaṃ.) /   Hetuyā nava … pe … avigate nava. /   Hetuṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nanakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
Katamañca, bhikkhave, saḷāyatanaṃ? /   Cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ—
Avijjāya asati saṅkhārā na honti; /   saṅkhāresu asati viññāṇaṃ na hoti;
Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sahassaṃ vā labheyyahaṃ. /   Adantadamanaṃ vīraṃ, /   sabbasattasukhāvahaṃ;
Atthi pītisahagato, atthi na pītisahagato.
Evaṃ dasavidhena viññāṇakkhandho. /   Ekavidhena viññāṇakkhandho— /   phassasampayutto.
Evaṃ dasavidhena viññāṇakkhandho. /   Ekavidhena viññāṇakkhandho—
phassasampayutto. /   Duvidhena viññāṇakkhandho— /   atthi hetusampayutto, atthi hetuvippayutto.
atthi lokiyo, atthi lokuttaro. /   Tividhena viññāṇakkhandho— /   atthi upādinnupādāniyo, atthi anupādinnupādāniyo, atthi anupādinnaanupādāniyo … pe ….
Tividhena viññāṇakkhandho— /   atthi savitakkasavicāro, atthi avitakkavicāramatto, atthi avitakkaavicāro … pe ….
atthi dassanena pahātabbo, atthi bhāvanāya pahātabbo, atthi neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbo … pe ….
atthi saṃyojanasampayutto, atthi saṃyojanavippayutto. /   Tividhena viññāṇakkhandho— /   atthi ācayagāmī, atthi apacayagāmī, atthi nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī … pe ….
cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ, rūpāyatanaṃ, saddāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, dhammāyatanaṃ.

idaṃ vuccati “domanassaṃ”. /   Tattha katamo upāyāso? /   Ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, sīlabyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, diṭṭhibyasanena vā phuṭṭhassa, aññataraññatarena byasanena samannāgatassa, aññataraññatarena dukkhadhammena phuṭṭhassa āyāso upāyāso āyāsitattaṃ upāyāsitattaṃ—
sevitabbampi asevitabbampī’ti, /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
‘ariyasāvako visamagatāya pajāya samappatto viharati, sabyāpajjāya pajāya abyāpajjo viharati, dhammasotaṃ samāpanno dhammānussatiṃ bhāveti’. (2)
‘Maraṇasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
‘Upaṭṭhitassatissāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo muṭṭhassatissā’ti, /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
‘Nippapañcārāmassāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo nippapañcaratino, nāyaṃ dhammo papañcārāmassa papañcaratino’ti, /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
‘Ākāsānañcāyatanampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, jhānaṃ nissāya āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. /   Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?

Bhāsitā kho panesā, āvuso pāthikaputta, samaṇena gotamena parisati vācā— /   abhabbo kho acelo pāthikaputto taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā mama sammukhībhāvaṃ āgantuṃ.

abhabbo acelo pāthikaputto taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā mama sammukhībhāvaṃ āgantuṃ. /   Sacepissa evamassa— /   ahaṃ taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā samaṇassa gotamassa sammukhībhāvaṃ gaccheyyanti, muddhāpi tassa vipateyya.
‘Cha viññāṇakāyā veditabbā’ti— /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
‘Cha phassakāyā veditabbā’ti— /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
‘Anindārosaṃ nissāya nindāroso pahātabbo’ti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
‘Akkodhūpāyāsaṃ nissāya kodhūpāyāso pahātabbo’ti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe. /   Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
Sampuṇṇe tiṃsakappamhi, /   devabhūtisanāmakā; /   Sattaratanasampannā,
Aparimitañca dukkhaṃ, /   Bahūni ca cittadomanassāni; /   Anubhohisi kāmayutto,
atthi paritto, atthi mahaggato, atthi appamāṇo … pe …. /   Evaṃ dasavidhena viññāṇakkhandho.

parallels.parsegment: Adhammañca viditvā anatthañca, dhammañca viditvā atthañca yathā dhammo yathā attho tathā paṭipajjitabban’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttan”ti.

sevitabbampi asevitabbampī’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttan”ti.

“ime dhammā akusalā, ime dhammā sāvajjā, ime dhammā viññugarahitā, ime dhammā samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantīti, atha tumhe, kālāmā, pajaheyyāthā”’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.

‘ime dhammā akusalā, ime dhammā sāvajjā, ime dhammā viññugarahitā, ime dhammā samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantīti, atha tumhe, bhaddiya, pajaheyyāthā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.

‘ime dhammā kusalā, ime dhammā anavajjā, ime dhammā viññuppasatthā, ime dhammā samattā samādinnā hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantīti, atha tumhe, bhaddiya, upasampajja vihareyyāthā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
‘Sikkhānisaṃsamidaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussati paññuttaraṃ vimuttisāraṃ satādhipateyyan’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttan”ti.
‘Asubhasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (1)
‘Āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (3)
‘Sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (4)
‘Aniccasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (5)
‘Anicce dukkhasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (6)
‘Dukkhe anattasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (7)
‘Appicchassāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo mahicchassā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (1)
‘Upaṭṭhitassatissāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo, muṭṭhassatissā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (5)
‘Paṭhamampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, jhānaṃ nissāya āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
‘Ākiñcaññāyatanampāhaṃ, nissāya āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
Ettha, deva, chandaṃ janehi jīvite apekkhaṃ karohi. /   Imāni te, deva, caturāsīti assasahassāni sovaṇṇālaṅkārāni sovaṇṇadhajāni hemajālapaṭicchannāni valāhakaassarājappamukhāni.
Atha kho so, bhaggava, licchavimahāmatto yena tindukakhāṇuparibbājakārāmo, yena acelo pāthikaputto tenupasaṅkami. upasaṅkamitvā acelaṃ pāthikaputtaṃ etadavoca:
‘Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbānī’ti— /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
Cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, manāyatanaṃ. /   ‘Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbānī’ti—
‘Cha bāhirāni āyatanāni veditabbānī’ti— /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.

‘Sampannasīlā, bhikkhave, viharatha sampannapātimokkhā; pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutā viharatha ācāragocarasampannā aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvino; samādāya sikkhatha sikkhāpadesū’ti— /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttan”ti.

“Chayime, bhikkhave, baḷisā lokasmiṃ anayāya sattānaṃ byābādhāya pāṇīnaṃ. /   Katame cha? /   Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitabaḷiso mārassa anayaṃ āpanno, byasanaṃ āpanno, yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato.

Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitabaḷiso mārassa anayaṃ āpanno, byasanaṃ āpanno, yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato”ti. /   Ayaṃ saṃkileso. /   Santi ca, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gilitabaḷiso mārassa, abhedi baḷisaṃ, paribhedi baḷisaṃ, na anayaṃ āpanno, na byasanaṃ āpanno, na yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato.

Yaṃ sotaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo attabhāvapariyāpanno anidassano sappaṭigho, yaṃ sotaṃ anidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ saddamhi anidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi paṭihaññi vā paṭihaññati vā paṭihaññissati vā paṭihaññe vā, sotaṃpetaṃ sotāyatanampetaṃ sotadhātupesā sotindriyampetaṃ lokopeso dvārāpesā samuddopeso paṇḍaraṃpetaṃ khettampetaṃ vatthuṃpetaṃ orimaṃ tīraṃpetaṃ suñño gāmopeso—
Yaṃ sotaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo attabhāvapariyāpanno anidassano sappaṭigho, yaṃ sotaṃ nissāya saddaṃ ārabbha sotasamphasso uppajji vā uppajjati vā uppajjissati vā uppajje vā … pe …
Yo kāyo catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo … pe … suñño gāmopeso— /   idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ kāyindriyaṃ. /   Katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ na kāyindriyaṃ?

Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, sotaviññāṇaṃ, ghānaviññāṇaṃ, jivhāviññāṇaṃ, kāyaviññāṇaṃ, manodhātu, manoviññāṇadhātu—

“Bhante nāgasena, imaṃ udakaṃ aggimhi tappamānaṃ cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati saddāyati bahuvidhaṃ, kiṃ nu kho, bhante nāgasena, udakaṃ jīvati, kiṃ kīḷamānaṃ saddāyati, udāhu aññena paṭipīḷitaṃ saddāyatī”ti?

“Na hi, mahārāja, udakaṃ jīvati, natthi udake jīvo vā satto vā, api ca, mahārāja, aggisantāpavegassa mahantatāya udakaṃ cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati saddāyati bahuvidhan”ti. /   “Bhante nāgasena, idhekacce titthiyā udakaṃ jīvatīti sītodakaṃ paṭikkhipitvā udakaṃ tāpetvā vekatikavekatikaṃ paribhuñjanti, te tumhe garahanti paribhavanti ‘ekindriyaṃ samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jīvaṃ viheṭhentī’ti, taṃ tesaṃ garahaṃ paribhavaṃ vinodehi apanehi nicchārehī”ti.

“Bhante nāgasena, idhekacce titthiyā udakaṃ jīvatīti sītodakaṃ paṭikkhipitvā udakaṃ tāpetvā vekatikavekatikaṃ paribhuñjanti, te tumhe garahanti paribhavanti ‘ekindriyaṃ samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jīvaṃ viheṭhentī’ti, taṃ tesaṃ garahaṃ paribhavaṃ vinodehi apanehi nicchārehī”ti. /   “Na hi, mahārāja, udakaṃ jīvati, natthi, mahārāja, udake jīvo vā satto vā, api ca, mahārāja, aggisantāpavegassa mahantatāya udakaṃ cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati saddāyati bahuvidhaṃ.

“Na hi, mahārāja, udakaṃ jīvati, natthi, mahārāja, udake jīvo vā satto vā, api ca, mahārāja, aggisantāpavegassa mahantatāya udakaṃ cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati saddāyati bahuvidhaṃ. /   Yathā, mahārāja, udakaṃ sobbhasarasaritadahataḷākakandarapadaraudapānaninnapokkharaṇigataṃ vātātapavegassa mahantatāya pariyādiyati parikkhayaṃ gacchati, api nu tattha udakaṃ cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati saddāyati bahuvidhan”ti?

Yathā, mahārāja, udakaṃ sobbhasarasaritadahataḷākakandarapadaraudapānaninnapokkharaṇigataṃ vātātapavegassa mahantatāya pariyādiyati parikkhayaṃ gacchati, api nu tattha udakaṃ cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati saddāyati bahuvidhan”ti? /   “Na hi, bhante”ti.
“Atthi, mahārāja, medāḷupaṃ nāma sakyānaṃ nigamo. /   Tattha so bhagavā etarahi viharati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti.

abhabbo acelo pāthikaputto taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā mama sammukhībhāvaṃ āgantuṃ. /   Sacepissa evamassa— /   ahaṃ taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā samaṇassa gotamassa sammukhībhāvaṃ gaccheyyanti, muddhāpi tassa vipateyya.

‘Akkodhūpāyāsaṃ nissāya kodhūpāyāso pahātabbo’ti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?

“Chayime, bhikkhave, baḷisā lokasmiṃ anayāya sattānaṃ byābādhāya pāṇīnaṃ. /   Katame cha? /   Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitabaḷiso mārassa anayaṃ āpanno, byasanaṃ āpanno, yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato.
Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe. /   Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
Sampuṇṇe tiṃsakappamhi, /   devabhūtisanāmakā; /   Sattaratanasampannā,
Aparimitañca dukkhaṃ, /   Bahūni ca cittadomanassāni; /   Anubhohisi kāmayutto,
atthi dassanena pahātabbo, atthi bhāvanāya pahātabbo, atthi neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbo … pe …. /   Evaṃ dasavidhena viññāṇakkhandho.
atthi saṃyojanasampayutto, atthi saṃyojanavippayutto. /   Tividhena viññāṇakkhandho— /   atthi ācayagāmī, atthi apacayagāmī, atthi nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī … pe ….
atthi paritto, atthi mahaggato, atthi appamāṇo … pe …. /   Evaṃ dasavidhena viññāṇakkhandho.

segment: Cha gehasitāni somanassāni, cha nekkhammasitāni somanassāni, cha gehasitāni domanassāni, cha nekkhammasitāni domanassāni, cha gehasitā upekkhā, cha nekkhammasitā upekkhā.

parallels.parsegment: tassa kāyaduṭṭhullampi na suppaṭippassaddhaṃ hoti, thinamiddhampi na susamūhataṃ hoti, uddhaccakukkuccampi na suppaṭivinītaṃ hoti.
tassa kāyaduṭṭhullampi na suppaṭippassaddhaṃ hoti, thinamiddhampi na susamūhataṃ hoti, uddhaccakukkuccampi na suppaṭivinītaṃ hoti.

Tattha yāni cha gehasitāni domanassāni yāni ca cha gehasitāni somanassāni yāni ca cha nekkhammasitāni domanassāni yāni ca cha nekkhammasitāni somanassāni, imāni catuvīsapadāni taṇhāpakkho, taṇhāya etaṃ vevacanaṃ.

So anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, seyyathidaṃ—ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi jātiyo tiṃsampi jātiyo cattālīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi anekepi saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe: ‘amutrāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapādiṃ; tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto, so tato cuto idhūpapanno’ti. Iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.

So tena lābhasakkārasilokena na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno sīlasampadaṃ ārādheti.

Yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe ye caññe maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccaṃ nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha maggasaccaṃ na nirujjhissati. /   Aggamaggassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arahantānaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe āpāyikānaṃ ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti tesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe arūpe aggaphalassa uppādakkhaṇe asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha dukkhasaccañca nuppajjati maggasaccañca na nirujjhissati.

‘ime dhammā akusalā, ime dhammā sāvajjā, ime dhammā viññugarahitā, ime dhammā samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantīti, atha tumhe, bhaddiya, pajaheyyāthā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.

‘ime dhammā kusalā, ime dhammā anavajjā, ime dhammā viññuppasatthā, ime dhammā samattā samādinnā hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantīti, atha tumhe, bhaddiya, upasampajja vihareyyāthā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
‘Sikkhānisaṃsamidaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussati paññuttaraṃ vimuttisāraṃ satādhipateyyan’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttan”ti.
‘Asubhasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (1)
‘Āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (3)
‘Sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (4)
‘Aniccasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (5)
‘Anicce dukkhasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (6)
‘Dukkhe anattasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (7)
‘Appicchassāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo mahicchassā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (1)
‘Upaṭṭhitassatissāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo, muṭṭhassatissā’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. (5)
‘Paṭhamampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, jhānaṃ nissāya āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
‘Ākiñcaññāyatanampāhaṃ, nissāya āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī’ti, /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.
Ettha, deva, chandaṃ janehi jīvite apekkhaṃ karohi. /   Imāni te, deva, caturāsīti assasahassāni sovaṇṇālaṅkārāni sovaṇṇadhajāni hemajālapaṭicchannāni valāhakaassarājappamukhāni.
Atha kho so, bhaggava, licchavimahāmatto yena tindukakhāṇuparibbājakārāmo, yena acelo pāthikaputto tenupasaṅkami. upasaṅkamitvā acelaṃ pāthikaputtaṃ etadavoca:
‘Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbānī’ti— /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ.

‘Sampannasīlā, bhikkhave, viharatha sampannapātimokkhā; pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutā viharatha ācāragocarasampannā aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvino; samādāya sikkhatha sikkhāpadesū’ti— /   iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ idametaṃ paṭicca vuttan”ti.

segment: ‘Tatra idaṃ nissāya idaṃ pajahathā’ti— /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ; Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?

‘Ākāsānañcāyatanampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, jhānaṃ nissāya āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. /   Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
‘parābhūtarūpo, bho, acelo pāthikaputto.

Bhāsitā kho panesā, āvuso pāthikaputta, samaṇena gotamena parisati vācā— /   abhabbo kho acelo pāthikaputto taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā mama sammukhībhāvaṃ āgantuṃ.

abhabbo acelo pāthikaputto taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā mama sammukhībhāvaṃ āgantuṃ. /   Sacepissa evamassa— /   ahaṃ taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā samaṇassa gotamassa sammukhībhāvaṃ gaccheyyanti, muddhāpi tassa vipateyya.

“Chayime, bhikkhave, baḷisā lokasmiṃ anayāya sattānaṃ byābādhāya pāṇīnaṃ. /   Katame cha? /   Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitabaḷiso mārassa anayaṃ āpanno, byasanaṃ āpanno, yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato.

segment: Evametesaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, evametesaṃ samatikkamo hoti.
Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā, atthi upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā.
Katamā ca, bhikkhave, upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā? /   Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā rūpesu, atthi saddesu, atthi gandhesu, atthi rasesu, atthi phoṭṭhabbesu—
ayaṃ, bhikkhave, upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā. /   Katamā ca, bhikkhave, upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā?
Atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā ākāsānañcāyatananissitā, atthi viññāṇañcāyatananissitā, atthi ākiñcaññāyatananissitā, atthi nevasaññānāsaññāyatananissitā—
ayaṃ, bhikkhave, upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā. /   Tatra, bhikkhave, yāyaṃ upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā taṃ nissāya taṃ āgamma yāyaṃ upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā taṃ pajahatha, taṃ samatikkamatha.
Evametissā pahānaṃ hoti, evametissā samatikkamo hoti.

“Ariṭṭho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi; /   upariṭṭho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṃ isigilismiṃ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
So tāya sīlasampadāya na attānukkaṃseti, na paraṃ vambheti. /   So tāya sīlasampadāya na majjati nappamajjati na pamādaṃ āpajjati, appamatto samāno samādhisampadaṃ ārādheti.
manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.

segment: ‘Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo sevati, yadariyo sevamāno satthā gaṇamanusāsitumarahatī’ti—
iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ; /   kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, bhikkhave, satthā sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṃ upādāya:

parallels.parsegment: sevitabbampi asevitabbampī’ti, /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
Atha kho mahānāmo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno, kho mahānāmo sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
‘ariyasāvako visamagatāya pajāya samappatto viharati, sabyāpajjāya pajāya abyāpajjo viharati, dhammasotaṃ samāpanno dhammānussatiṃ bhāveti’. (2)

iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appiccho samāno ‘appicchoti maṃ jāneyyun’ti na icchati, santuṭṭho samāno ‘santuṭṭhoti maṃ jāneyyun’ti na icchati, pavivitto samāno ‘pavivittoti maṃ jāneyyun’ti na icchati, āraddhavīriyo samāno ‘āraddhavīriyoti maṃ jāneyyun’ti na icchati, upaṭṭhitassati samāno ‘upaṭṭhitassatīti maṃ jāneyyun’ti na icchati, samāhito samāno ‘samāhitoti maṃ jāneyyun’ti na icchati, paññavā samāno ‘paññavāti maṃ jāneyyun’ti na icchati, nippapañcārāmo samāno ‘nippapañcārāmoti maṃ jāneyyun’ti na icchati.

‘Santuṭṭhassāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo asantuṭṭhassā’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti itarītaracīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena.

‘Pavivittassāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo saṅgaṇikārāmassā’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato bhavanti upasaṅkamitāro bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo rājāno rājamahāmattā titthiyā titthiyasāvakā.

‘Āraddhavīriyassāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo kusītassā’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
‘Upaṭṭhitassatissāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo muṭṭhassatissā’ti, /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi … pe … catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
‘Nippapañcārāmassāyaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammo nippapañcaratino, nāyaṃ dhammo papañcārāmassa papañcaratino’ti, /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?

‘Paṭhamampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, jhānaṃ nissāya āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. /   Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi … pe … paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.

‘catutthampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, jhānaṃ nissāya āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. /   Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
‘Ākāsānañcāyatanampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, jhānaṃ nissāya āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. /   Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?

ākiñcaññāyatanampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, nissāya āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. /   Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
Atha taṃ parisaṃ āgantvā evamārocesi: /   ‘parābhūtarūpo, bho, acelo pāthikaputto.

‘abhikkamāvuso pāthikaputta, abhikkantaṃ te seyyo, abhikkantā abhiññātā abhiññātā licchavī, abhikkantā abhiññātā abhiññātā ca brāhmaṇamahāsālā gahapatinecayikā nānātitthiyā samaṇabrāhmaṇā. Samaṇopi gotamo āyasmato ārāme divāvihāraṃ nisinno.

Yannūnāhampi aññataraṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ nissāya āsayaṃ kappeyyaṃ. /   Tatrāsayaṃ kappetvā sāyanhasamayaṃ āsayā nikkhameyyaṃ, āsayā nikkhamitvā vijambheyyaṃ, vijambhitvā samantā catuddisā anuvilokeyyaṃ, samantā catuddisā anuviloketvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadeyyaṃ, tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkameyyaṃ.
Itivuttaka 11 /   Mohapariññāsutta /   Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā vuttamarahatāti me sutaṃ:
Phalāni khuddakappāni, /   bhuñja rāja varaṃ varaṃ. /   Idampi pānīyaṃ sītaṃ,
soṇa taṃ nissitā mayaṃ; /   Upaghātuṃ labhe nandaṃ, /   muddhani brahmacārinaṃ.
“Anukampikā patiṭṭhā ca, /   pubbe rasadadī ca no;
tosentī tena vuccati. /   Tato vātātape ghore, /   mamaṃ katvā udikkhati;
Mātaraṃ aparicaritvāna, /   Kicchaṃ vā so nigacchati. /   Dhanāpi dhanakāmānaṃ,
pitā vā puttakāraṇā. /   Yasmā ca saṅgahā ete, /   sammapekkhanti paṇḍitā;
‘Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbānī’ti— /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
‘Cha bāhirāni āyatanāni veditabbānī’ti— /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?

“Chayime, bhikkhave, baḷisā lokasmiṃ anayāya sattānaṃ byābādhāya pāṇīnaṃ. /   Katame cha? /   Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitabaḷiso mārassa anayaṃ āpanno, byasanaṃ āpanno, yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato.

Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitabaḷiso mārassa anayaṃ āpanno, byasanaṃ āpanno, yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato”ti. /   Ayaṃ saṃkileso. /   Santi ca, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na gilitabaḷiso mārassa, abhedi baḷisaṃ, paribhedi baḷisaṃ, na anayaṃ āpanno, na byasanaṃ āpanno, na yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato.
Adhigacchiṃ tadā pītiṃ, /   vipulañca sukhuttamaṃ; /   Uppajjateva ratanaṃ,
Aparimitañca dukkhaṃ, /   Bahūni ca cittadomanassāni; /   Anubhohisi kāmayutto,
Saṃghārāmamhi navanivesamhi; /   Sakhiyo tisso janiyo, /   Vihāradānaṃ adāsimha.
Atthi pītisahagato, atthi na pītisahagato.
Evaṃ dasavidhena viññāṇakkhandho. /   Ekavidhena viññāṇakkhandho— /   phassasampayutto.
Evaṃ dasavidhena viññāṇakkhandho. /   Ekavidhena viññāṇakkhandho—
phassasampayutto. /   Duvidhena viññāṇakkhandho— /   atthi hetusampayutto, atthi hetuvippayutto.
atthi lokiyo, atthi lokuttaro. /   Tividhena viññāṇakkhandho— /   atthi upādinnupādāniyo, atthi anupādinnupādāniyo, atthi anupādinnaanupādāniyo … pe ….
Tividhena viññāṇakkhandho— /   atthi savitakkasavicāro, atthi avitakkavicāramatto, atthi avitakkaavicāro … pe ….
atthi dassanena pahātabbo, atthi bhāvanāya pahātabbo, atthi neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbo … pe ….
atthi saṃyojanasampayutto, atthi saṃyojanavippayutto. /   Tividhena viññāṇakkhandho— /   atthi ācayagāmī, atthi apacayagāmī, atthi nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī … pe ….
sevitabbampi asevitabbampī’ti, /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
‘Maraṇasaññā, bhikkhave, bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsā amatogadhā amatapariyosānā’ti, iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?

Bhāsitā kho panesā, āvuso pāthikaputta, samaṇena gotamena parisati vācā— /   abhabbo kho acelo pāthikaputto taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā mama sammukhībhāvaṃ āgantuṃ.

abhabbo acelo pāthikaputto taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā mama sammukhībhāvaṃ āgantuṃ. /   Sacepissa evamassa— /   ahaṃ taṃ vācaṃ appahāya taṃ cittaṃ appahāya taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissajjitvā samaṇassa gotamassa sammukhībhāvaṃ gaccheyyanti, muddhāpi tassa vipateyya.
‘Cha viññāṇakāyā veditabbā’ti— /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
‘Cha phassakāyā veditabbā’ti— /   iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
‘Anindārosaṃ nissāya nindāroso pahātabbo’ti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
‘Akkodhūpāyāsaṃ nissāya kodhūpāyāso pahātabbo’ti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ?
Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe. /   Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
Sampuṇṇe tiṃsakappamhi, /   devabhūtisanāmakā; /   Sattaratanasampannā,
atthi paritto, atthi mahaggato, atthi appamāṇo … pe …. /   Evaṃ dasavidhena viññāṇakkhandho.
“‘Apāṇātipātaṃ nissāya pāṇātipāto pahātabbo’ti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
‘Dinnādānaṃ nissāya adinnādānaṃ pahātabban’ti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
‘Saccavācaṃ nissāya musāvādo pahātabbo’ti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
‘Apisuṇaṃ vācaṃ nissāya pisuṇā vācā pahātabbā’ti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
‘Agiddhilobhaṃ nissāya giddhilobho pahātabbo’ti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
‘Anatimānaṃ nissāya atimāno pahātabbo’ti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ? /   Idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako iti paṭisañcikkhati:
“Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo”ti.

segment: ‘idaṃ vo hitāya, idaṃ vo sukhāyā’ti.

parallels.parsegment: Sovaṇṇamaye kūṭāgāre rūpiyamayo pallaṅko paññatto ahosi, rūpiyamaye kūṭāgāre sovaṇṇamayo pallaṅko paññatto ahosi, veḷuriyamaye kūṭāgāre dantamayo pallaṅko paññatto ahosi, phalikamaye kūṭāgāre sāramayo pallaṅko paññatto ahosi.
Māpesi kho, ānanda, rājā mahāsudassano mahāviyūhassa kūṭāgārassa dvāre sabbasovaṇṇamayaṃ tālavanaṃ, yattha divāvihāraṃ nisīdi.
Rūpiyamayāya vedikāya rūpiyamayā thambhā ahesuṃ, sovaṇṇamayā sūciyo ca uṇhīsañca. /   Dhammo, ānanda, pāsādo dvīhi kiṅkiṇikajālehi parikkhitto ahosi—
Ye kho panānanda, tena samayena kusāvatiyā rājadhāniyā dhuttā ahesuṃ soṇḍā pipāsā, te tesaṃ kiṅkiṇikajālānaṃ vāteritānaṃ saddena paricāresuṃ.

Seyyathāpi, ānanda, vassānaṃ pacchime māse saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalāhake deve ādicco nabhaṃ abbhussakkamāno duddikkho hoti musati cakkhūni; /   evameva kho, ānanda, dhammo pāsādo duddikkho ahosi musati cakkhūni.
Mohapariññāsutta /   Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā vuttamarahatāti me sutaṃ:
vipulañca sukhuttamaṃ; /   Uppajjateva ratanaṃ, /   nibbattassa tahiṃ tahiṃ.
Rūpiyamayassa kūṭāgārassa dvāre sovaṇṇamayo tālo ṭhito ahosi, tassa sovaṇṇamayo khandho, rūpiyamayāni pattāni ca phalāni ca.

segment: Tassa sāvakā na sussūsanti, na sotaṃ odahanti, na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, vokkamma ca satthusāsanā vattanti.

parallels.parsegment: Sovaṇṇamaye kūṭāgāre rūpiyamayo pallaṅko paññatto ahosi, rūpiyamaye kūṭāgāre sovaṇṇamayo pallaṅko paññatto ahosi, veḷuriyamaye kūṭāgāre dantamayo pallaṅko paññatto ahosi, phalikamaye kūṭāgāre sāramayo pallaṅko paññatto ahosi.
Rūpiyamayassa kūṭāgārassa dvāre sovaṇṇamayo tālo ṭhito ahosi, tassa sovaṇṇamayo khandho, rūpiyamayāni pattāni ca phalāni ca.
Māpesi kho, ānanda, rājā mahāsudassano mahāviyūhassa kūṭāgārassa dvāre sabbasovaṇṇamayaṃ tālavanaṃ, yattha divāvihāraṃ nisīdi.
Dhammo, ānanda, pāsādo dvīhi kiṅkiṇikajālehi parikkhitto ahosi—
Ye kho panānanda, tena samayena kusāvatiyā rājadhāniyā dhuttā ahesuṃ soṇḍā pipāsā, te tesaṃ kiṅkiṇikajālānaṃ vāteritānaṃ saddena paricāresuṃ.

Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti. /   Dvedhāvitakkasuttaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ navamaṃ.

imehi kho ahaṃ, thapati, dasahi dhammehi samannāgataṃ purisapuggalaṃ paññapemi sampannakusalaṃ paramakusalaṃ uttamapattipattaṃ samaṇaṃ ayojjhan”ti. /   Idamavoca bhagavā. /   Attamano pañcakaṅgo thapati bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.

Jarāmaccuparetānanti jarāya phuṭṭhānaṃ paretānaṃ samohitānaṃ samannāgatānaṃ, maccunā phuṭṭhānaṃ paretānaṃ samohitānaṃ samannāgatānaṃ jātiyā anugatānaṃ jarāya anusaṭānaṃ byādhinā abhibhūtānaṃ maraṇena abbhāhatānaṃ atāṇānaṃ aleṇānaṃ asaraṇānaṃ asaraṇībhūtānanti—

Esāhaṃ, bho gotama, satta ca usabhasatāni satta ca vacchatarasatāni satta ca vacchatarīsatāni satta ca ajasatāni satta ca urabbhasatāni muñcāmi, jīvitaṃ demi, haritāni ceva tiṇāni khādantu, sītāni ca pānīyāni pivantu, sīto ca nesaṃ vāto upavāyatū”ti.
mahāsālā ca brāhmaṇā; /   Ime ca khattiyā sabbe,
‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti. /   Idamavoca bhagavā. /   Attamano āyasmā rāhulo bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
evañhi vo, sāriputta, sikkhitabban”ti. /   Idamavoca bhagavā. /   Attamano āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
“Tasmātiha tvaṃ, ānanda, imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ madhupiṇḍikapariyāyotveva naṃ dhārehī”ti. /   Idamavoca bhagavā. /   Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
‘yena me idaṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ anuppavatteyyātha, mā kho me tumhe antimapurisā ahuvatthā’”ti. /   Idamavoca bhagavā. /   Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti. /   Idamavoca bhagavā. /   Attamano so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandi.
Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti. /   Tiṃsatimaṃ.
Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti. /   Cūḷapuṇṇamasuttaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ dasamaṃ.
Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti. /   Cūḷaassapurasuttaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ dasamaṃ.
Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti. /   Āṭānāṭiyasuttaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ navamaṃ.
Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti. /   Bāhitikasuttaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ.
